products.title: JAIR AI Text Detection
products.description:
CPU-native, interpretable, and drift-resistant AI text detection engine â€” perfect for large-scale online scenarios and local/edge deployment.

ðŸš€ Lightweight & Cost-Effective: Built on ~68 stylometric/readability features with 1D-CNN (~25 MB) and Random Forest (~10.6 MB). No expensive LLM inference required. Standard CPU processes <100 ms per sample.

ðŸŽ¯ Accurate & Robust: Achieved ~97% accuracy (CNN) and ~95% (RF) on Kaggle AI-vs-Human subset, with ROC-AUC up to ~99.5%. Includes confusion matrix, F1 scores, and calibration curves for comprehensive auditing.

ðŸ“Š Interpretable & Monitorable: Features extracted via spaCy + TextDescriptives provide transparent metrics: readability scores, POS distributions, syntactic complexity, lexical diversity, etc. Supports feature importance analysis and drift alerts.

ðŸ”„ Cross-Domain Extensible: Unified extract-normalize-inference pipeline makes it easy to incrementally update feature sets and threshold configurations. Adapts to different domains: academic essays, social media posts, code comments.

ðŸ”’ Privacy & Compliance Friendly: Extracts only statistical and stylistic features. Deployable locally without data leaving your network, meeting enterprise compliance requirements.
